TopicTitle: Artist that love star wars is requested!

Articles.Content: I'm not sure if this is the right forum to ask but I think this is the most appropiate, There is a mod named Universe Replacer which lets you retexture stars, now I think someone should make a Death Star surface map so we can make Kerbin Death Star! The surface map needs to be 1917 x 959 and PNG file. Much appreciated!
